name: defeatist

effect.scarlet-violet: This Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack are halved when it has half its HP or less.
effect.the-teal-mask: This Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack are halved when it has half its HP or less.
effect.the-indigo-disk: This Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack are halved when it has half its HP or less.

short_effect: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.
